>

---

class: center, middle

.larger[**Regular Expressions versus _Strings_ of Regular Expressions**]

---

.larger[Useful Shortcuts for RegExps]

--

.pull-left[
**.** -- Represents any character  
**^** -- Looks at the beginning  
**$** -- Looks at the end  

</br>
</br>

**\w** -- Looks for any word  
**\d** -- Looks for any digit  
**\w** -- Looks for any whitespace
]

--

.pull-right[
**?** -- Occurs 0 or 1 times  
**+** -- Occurs 1 or more times  
__*__ -- Occurs 0 or more times

</br>
</br>

**[abc]** -- Matches a, b, or c  
**[^abc]** -- Matches anything except a, b, or c

]

---

class: center

.larger[Creating Groups & Referencing Groups]

--

Groups can be created with **( )**

--

A **|** can be used to search for **either** letter in a group

```
"gr(e|a)y"
```
--

Groups can be referenced based on their position

```
"(.)(.)\\2\\1"
```
--

**What type of word does the last regex search for?**

class: center, middle

.larger[Want to know if a value is contained in a string?] 

--

Use `str_detect()`!

---

class: center, middle

.larger[Want to see what string(s) have certain patterns?]

--

Use `str_extract()` or `str_extract_all()`!

---

class: center, middle

.larger[Want to extract components of a string?]

--

.pull-left[
.large[**Based on their location?**]

Use `str_sub()`!
]

--

.pull-right[
.large[**Based on a value?**]

Use `str_subset()`!
]

---

class: center, middle

.larger[Want to replace value(s) in a string?]

--

Use `str_replace()` or `str_replace_all()`!

---

class: center, middle

.larger[Want to smoosh values of a string together?]

--

Use `str_c()` or `str_flatten()`!
